value:
All alone, in a pitch-dark room... I've
cried so many times, and that's why...
I don't want to be alone anymore.

I kept having scary dreams about the
fire dragons and ice dragons... Will
that happen to me too, one day?

If I stay here with all of you, I won't
have those scary dreams anymore?
Really? You mean it?

Everyone is so nice! I love them all!
I want to live together with humans!

Ban-Ban took me to a human village.
It was so warm and bright outside,
and so much fun...

Will you play with me? I came here
from $Nf's castle!

Gotoh said no dragon would compare
to me if I ever got angry.

Please... I don't want to be alone
anymore. Ban-Ban, Mar-Mar...

Huh? Oh, I'm so sorry. I guess
I couldn't do it quite right...

Wow... Even though I'm a dragon,
everyone is so nice to me!

I'm... Tiki... Will the scary dreams go
away if I stay here?

The White Sage, Gotoh, told me to
stay asleep for as long as I could, but
the dreams... They were terrifying...$k$pI would turn into a monster, just like
those poor fire and ice dragons, and
then I'd start attacking humans!$k$pI'd scream and wake up, only to find
I was still in that pitch-dark room.
...I used to cry, all the time.$k$pI had this feeling that every time I fell
asleep, I got closer to becoming a
monster... I was so scared.$k$pBut then, Mar-Mar came. He said that
the Binding Shield would protect me.
That I could go outside.$k$pI won't become a monster, and I
don't want to go back. So, can I stay
here with everyone? Please?
Now I'm angry!
I said no!
I will get you!
You asked for it!
Where's Mar-Mar...
I can stay here with all of you, can't I?
*surprised* You were teasing me just now, weren't you?
Thanks to Mar-Mar, I can be up and about! No more sleeping.
I can't stop smiling... I want to do things! Lots and lots of things!
Would you play hide-and-seek with me? Great, you're it! Hee hee!
I want to eat some of Ban-Ban's pickled vegetables...
I can stay with you forever! Isn't that amazing!
You've got it!
Which way?
I promise I'll behave.
